name: Last Harvest
description: Scavengers trespass on Providence Territory.

name: Providence
description: Alien swarms are forming in the clouds. Time to return home.

name: Breeding Fields
description: Meet with the Earth Reclamation Forces research team.

name: Overcast
description: Journey to the DARPA Laboratory leads across hostile wasteland.

name: DARPA Research Facility
description: Former military base, now infested with Aliens and Scavengers alike.

name: Devastation
description: War Train speeding through the sand storm needs to be stopped.

name: Chasing Sunset
description: We have located another specimen of the rare Obliterator Alien.

name: Night Raid
description: Pre-emptive strike on Scavengers could be an oppurtunity to field test new technology.

name: Very Large Array
description: Majestic antennas tower in the distance.

name: Deep Space Network Complex
description: Equipment once used to listen to the stars can be repurposed to silence them.

name: Transmission
description: If the Reaper Signal passes through the depths of the Sludge Sea, nothing is beyond our reach.

name: From the Ashes
description: Reckless Scavenger offensive threatens ERF research.

name: Newark Suburbs
description: Despite the City being hailed as the safest place on Earth, its sprawling outskirts are deadly.

name: Newark Capital City
description: The post-war capital of the world is the only remaining human population center on Earth.

name: Bolton Sphere Reactor
description: A single plasma fusion core powers the entire metropolis.

name: Retribution
description: President Magnus escapes with his battle fleet.

name: Power Grab
description: Desperate and out of options, we have decided to seek out the Alien Seedship.

name: Stratosphere
description: Alien Oneiromants weave interstellar dreams.

name: Killing Moon
description: All ERF units work on one task only; tracking down the interface.

name: Fort Apocalypse
description: Warlord Vega must answer for his crimes.

name: Interface
description: The elusive alien telepath shall hide from us no more.

name: Deep Sea Mining Towers
description: Should we allow the Seedship to refuel, it may vanish into the depths of outer space.

name: Ruins
description: The Seedship is hiding amongst the smoldering remains of Newark City.

name: Ascension
description: The final battle decides the fate of the Earth.
